channel.title: 1 client wil work for server
channel.description: how to i make it so 1 client will work on server so no one can use hacker clients ex. azn client. i have hacker using it and giving every 1 phats. when i ban him he gets a new ip every 1 min!!!! so anoying. or is there an easier way of doing this.....

item.title: 1 client wil work for server
item.dc:creator: @oO_S-n-1-P-3-r_Oo oO_S-n-1-P-3-r_Oo
item.description:
@oO_S-n-1-P-3-r_Oo wrote:

hmm, try not to give people your ip? idk kinda hard,
make a new client with a differnt ip, and make the ip hard to fingure out so the name of the server doesn’t match the ip :example": servername:skillcape but change the ip to like ______.servegame.com or somthing, just make it hard to figure out.

or you could make a webclient
all i got so far.
